description: Variants of [Anchor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0504) can use DNS tunneling to communicate with C2.(Citation: Cyberreason Anchor December 2019)(Citation: Medium Anchor DNS July 2020)

external_references.description: Dahan, A. et al. (2019, December 11). DROPPING ANCHOR: FROM A TRICKBOT INFECTION TO THE DISCOVERY OF THE ANCHOR MALWARE. Retrieved September 10, 2020.
Grange, W. (2020, July 13). Anchor_dns malware goes cross platform. Retrieved September 10, 2020.
